pages.text: $(li)The Yak is a creature similar to the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cow)Cow$(/l) that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/mountains)Mountains$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be right clicking while you are holding an $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/bucket)Empty Bucket$(/l) to get a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/milk_bucket)Bucket of Milk$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can right click on one Yak while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in your hand to obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/yak_hair)Yak Hair$(/l).
Be careful, because the sheared Yak will attack you immediately after doing this.
$(li)Yaks may drop Raw Beef and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/environmental/yak_hair)Yak Hair$(/l) upon death.
